message: I recently signed up for voip.ms to replace my home phone service, and I absolutely love it. They've got an API for doing *some* things with the account, and I've got a lot of flexibility in terms of extra numbers, sub-accounts, etc. I'm wondering if anyone out there has done anything interesting with a service like this? There are Python bindings for PJSIP, so it seems like the sky's the limit.
are you familiar with Asterisk? run your own server from home and you'll be able to do even more - never heard of asterisk before check out http://www.Cognation.net/Asterisk
Yeah, I should probably look at what people are doing with Asterisk servers to give myself some ideas.
